channel.title: Can someone clear this up for me?
channel.description:
Most of the things I see now are out of date, and they don't have the downloads and things I need/see. Can anyone tell me these three things?
-What version of java to download (an up-to-date link will really be useful)
-What to put as a Classpath and Path in the enviromental variables
-What to put in my compiler
...:::Thanks in advance:::...

item.title: Can someone clear this up for me?
item.dc:creator: @LoveScaper LoveScaper
item.description:
@LoveScaper wrote:

take out the ''s in your path and classpath(only for java part) i think…

Read full topic

item.title: Can someone clear this up for me?
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Here’s my classpath. I have JDK 6u1, but I’ll change for JDK 6u2.

C:\Program Files\Java\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\

Here’s my path, changed as above.

c:\Windows\System32\;”C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\;C:\Program Files\Common Files\Adobe\AGL

They work fine for me, so maybe they will for you

Read full topic
